attributes.action: make st Georges day a national holiday.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: English people have the right to demand a day's holiday to celebrate St Georges day. There are lots of events organised around the country to mark this occasion however with most of the country at work such events are impossible to attend. Make time for us to celebrate our heritage before we loose our identity.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
